content:
From: Florian Haftmann <florian.haftmann@informatik.tu-muenchen.de>
JEdit FAILED
(see also
/home/haftmann/data/tum/isabelle/devel/heaps/polyml-5.8.2_x86_64_32-linux/log/JEdit)
*** Cannot unzip jedit.jar
*** return code = 9
*** At command "text" (line 162 of "~~/src/Doc/JEdit/JEdit.thy")

(This applies to 0398f18ec76c, but very likely also to the RC, but the
issues seems not pressing enought to me there).

Florian
signature.asc

From: Makarius <makarius@sketis.net>
The same happens in Isabelle2020, and earlier.

Note that this is only relevant to bootstrap a distribution. The standard
procedure for that is to sprinkle "isabelle jedit -b" generously into various
build scripts.

Next time, I could just make Isabelle/jEdit an integral part of
Isabelle/Scala: like Isabelle/VSCode and other add-ons are already today.

Makarius

isabelle-dev mailing list
isabelle-dev@in.tum.de
https://mailman46.in.tum.de/mailman/listinfo/isabelle-dev
